data.text: Yosafati yi faxa, e yi a maluxun a benbane fɛma Dawudaa Taani. A dii xɛmɛn Yehorami yi dɔxɔ a ɲɔxɔni mangayani.
Yehorami xunyɛne ni i ra, Yosafati a dii xɛmɛne: Asari nun Yɛxiyɛli nun Sakari nun Asarayahu nun Mikeli e nun Sɛfati. Isirayila mangan Yosafati nan ma dii xɛmɛye yi e birin na.

E fafe Yosafati bata yi se faɲi wuyaxi so e yii gbeti fixɛ daxin nun xɛma daxin nun se faɲi gbɛtɛye, a mɔn yi Yuda taa rakantanxine sa ne fari, koni a yi Yehorami lu a ɲɔxɔni mangayani bayo na nan yi dii xɛmɛ singen na.
Yehorami yelin dɔxɛ mangan na a fafe a yamanani waxatin naxan yi, a sɛnbɛn sɔtɔ, a yi a xunyɛne birin faxa silanfanna ra e nun Isirayila kuntigina ndee.21.4 Silanfanna: Sofane yɛngɛso dɛgɛmana.
Yehorami findi mangan na a ɲɛɛ tonge saxan e nun firinden nan ma, a yi ɲɛɛ solomasɛxɛ ti mangayani Yerusalɛn yi.
A wali kiin yi ɲaxu alo Isirayila mangane, alo Axabi a denbayana, amasɔtɔ a bata yi Axabi a dii tɛmɛna nde dɔxɔ. Naxan ɲaxu Alatala yɛɛ ra yi, a na liga nɛn.
Koni hali na, Alatala mi tin Dawuda bɔnsɔnna raxɔrɛ, amasɔtɔ a layirin tongo nɛn Dawuda xa, a ɲɔxɔn mi ɲanɲɛ mangayani habadan, a tan nun a diine.
Yehorami waxatini, Edɔn kaane yi murutɛ Yuda xili ma, e yi mangana nde dɔxɔ e yɛtɛ xa.
Yehorami nun a sofa kuntigine nun a yɛngɛ so wontorone birin yi siga. Kɔɛ tagini, mangan nun a wontoro kuntigine yi Edɔn kaane yɛngɛ naxanye bata yi e rabilin, e yi e nɔ.
Edɔn kaane yi lu murutɛxi Yuda nɔ sɔtɔn xili ma han to. Libina kaane fan murutɛ nɛn na waxatini, amasɔtɔ Yehorami bata yi a mɛ Alatala ra, a benbane Ala.
Yehorami yi kidene rafala Yuda geyane fari, a yi Yerusalɛn kaane nun Yuda kaane ti tinxintareyaan ma, e yi Ala yanfa e suxurene xɔn alo ɲaxanla na a xɛmɛn yanfa yalunyaan kiraan xɔn.
Nabi Eli yi bataxin sɛbɛ Yehorami ma, a naxa, “Alatala, i benba Dawudaa Ala ito nan falaxi, a naxa, ‘I mi luxi tinxinni alo i fafe Yosafati nun Yuda mangana Asa.

I yi bira Isirayila mangane fɔxɔ ra. I bata Yuda kaane nun Yerusalɛn kaane ti tinxintareyaan ma, e yi Ala yanfa e suxurene xɔn alo Axabi a denbayana a liga kii naxan yi. I bata i xunyɛ xɛmɛmane faxa i fafe a denbayani, naxanye yi fisa i tan xa.
Nanara, Alatala tɔrɔn nafama nɛn i ya muxune ma, i ya diine nun i ya ɲaxanle nun i gbeen seen naxanye birin na,
a yi fure ɲaxin nafa i ma, na furen ɲaxuma ayi i ra nɛn han i fudi xunxurine yi mini kɛnɛnni.’ ”
Filisitine nun Arabun naxanye yi dɔxi Kusi kaane fɛma, Alatala yi ne radin Yehorami xili ma.

E yi siga Yuda kaane xili ma, e yi so yamanani. Seen naxanye birin yi manga banxini, e yi ne birin tongo, e yi mangana diine nun a ɲaxanle suxu, e siga e ra. A dii xɛmɛ dɔnxɛna Axasiya nan keden lu na.
Na birin to dangu, Alatala yi kui fure yalantaren nafa a ma.

A furen yi siga gboɛ ayi, han a ɲɛɛ firinden dɔnxɛn na, Yehorami a furen sɛnbɛn yi gbo ayi, a fudi xunxurine yi mini kɛnɛnni. A yi faxa ɲaxankata gbeeni. A muxune mi wusulan gan a binya feen na, alo e a liga a benbane xa kii naxan yi.

Yehorami findi mangan na a ɲɛɛ tonge saxan e nun firinden nan ma, a yi ɲɛɛ solomasɛxɛ ti mangayani Yerusalɛn yi. A yi faxa. Muxu yo mi nimisa. E yi a maluxun Dawudaa Taani, koni a mi maluxun mangane gaburune ra.
